block.p: North Tarrytown, N.Y. $337,500

3-bedroom, 3-bath, 22-year-old colonial; den, fireplace, eat-in kitchen, family room, patio, playroom, 2-car garage; taxes $8,204. Ossining, N.Y. $325,000
